issue.title: Add compression and use_dictionary options to Parquet interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-305](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-305). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add options to specify if we want to have dictionary encoding or compression to the Parquet interface in pyarrow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-305?focusedCommentId=15531509) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 148
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/148>
